1140220.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #2 (5E)
1140220.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #2

Introducing
Mini-
Dungeon
Monthly
, the
monthly RPG zine from AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-
Dungeon adventures for
Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition.

Five adventures included!

Considering Bees
An adventure for four characters of 2nd level by Thomas Baumbach
Umbravania: The Tirade of Doctor Livingstone
An adventure for four characters of 3rd to 5th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Roots of Yggdrasil
An adventure for four characters of 5th to 8th level by Jonathan G. Nelson
Malice on Jade Mountain
An adventure for four characters of 10th to 12th level by Jonathan G. Nelson
Carnival of the Clown King
An adventure for any number of characters of any level by Justin Andrew Mason
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
